DOC.brief_summary: Abdominal surgery cause severe postoperative pain . Multi-modal pain therapy usually apply perfect choice . It depend physician 's skill situation . The best regimen patient-controlled analgesia , require expensive equipment . Transdermal fentanyl patch , usually use chronic pain relief , steadily release fentanyl blood stream 72 hour , slow onset 12 hour . Hypothesis : If Transdermal fentanyl patch apply 10-12 hour surgery , may provide good analgesia 72 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Transdermal Fentanyl Patch Postoperative Analgesia After Abdominal Surgery : Randomized Placebo-controlled Trial
